title: Lag Issues and Bugs- Patch 6.15
body: Ever since I had updated my League to Patch 6.15, my ping has jumped up to 300, when it was normally about 30. I am using a Mac which could be a contributing factor, but I have had zero problems with lag on this Mac up until now?? Does anyone else have high ping? Also, I have seen discussions about bug problems on this patch too-Game crashes and bug splat problems. Riot please fix this!

replies.body:
Please follow the steps (if there are any you haven't completed) on the [Connection Troubleshooting Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to make sure your connection is set up properly.

If those steps don't help, you can view your connection by running a traceroute, and sharing the results might show us where it's going wrong. I suggest downloading the [WinMTR Network Diagnostic Tool](http://winmtr.net/download-winmtr/), then use that to run a traceroute to the following IP (allow this to run for 5-15 minutes);

104.160.131.1

Export the results to a text file and paste them here if you'd like us to help, or submit them in a [Support Ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).

Please help me out ! I got loading screen crash after 6.15 patch I uninstalled the game and am trying to install it back but whenever I open the launcher it says "PVP.NET Patcher Kernal Not Responding " I used to solve this by going to lol patcher folder and launch it from there but now since I uninstalled the game I don't have that folder ! please help riot I wanna play since 14 hours ago and I am stuck with this

> [{quoted}](name=Marlyna,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=6m8X4yYP,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2016-07-26T21:25:36.110+0000)
>
> Please help me out ! I got loading screen crash after 6.15 patch I uninstalled the game and am trying to install it back but whenever I open the launcher it says "PVP.NET Patcher Kernal Not Responding " I used to solve this by going to lol patcher folder and launch it from there but now since I uninstalled the game I don't have that folder ! please help riot I wanna play since 14 hours ago and I am stuck with this

Pls refer to what I said above ^_^

I have fixedthe problem by going to lol icon left click /properties/compatibility/ check run this program compatibility and set it to windows vista then apply and run it as administrator. This should fix it if anyone got pvp.net problem

My ping has been going CRAZY lately. Randomly as well. I will have a stable connection and then suddenly BAM lag spikes. I don't share bandwidth with anyone either so I don't understand why my ping is so crazy and spastic. My brother when he plays gets horrible lag, but when I play on EUW servers my ping is a stable 120-130. On NA it jumps around to 28-300 in the drop of a hate. I live 2 hours north from where the servers are even located.

I'm having the same problem in the US.  Some of my friends on opposite sides of the country with different internet providers are also having issues.  Never had lag spikes til this last patch and now my ping goes to 250-500 whenever a few people are close to me.  The timing of this and amount of people it's affecting doesn't sound like an issue on my end.

I normally play at around 50-80 ping depending on the time of day and who is using the bandwidth at my house. I patched to 6.15 and I am suddenly running at 999 ping in the loading screen and upwards of 2,000 ping in game. I don't know what is happening because no other patches have given me lag.

Since patches deal purely in local files in your League installation, they're *highly unlikely* to affect your latency (ping) to the server. There are a number of potential causes to your rise in latency, but *CrazFight* has provided a great place to start. 

If you continue to see issues after working through the guide they sent, get back to me with the traceroute results they mentioned.

300 ? I wish I can just see the loading screen .. it just crashes before loading the game I tried everything nothing works. 
I also have that pvp.net stopped working error even I uninstalled the game now I can't install back because after it finishes installing it says pvp.net error. I mean every single patch i face this problem like what the heck riot I started to hate it when I hear about new patches don't rush updates untill you are 100% sure there will be no bugs and crap
